name: IA CONSTRUCTION CORPORATION and Liberty Mutual Insurance Co. v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (RHODES). Petition of Jeffrey Rhodes
name_abbreviation: IA Construction Corp. v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board

parties: IA CONSTRUCTION CORPORATION and Liberty Mutual Insurance Co. v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (RHODES). Petition of Jeffrey Rhodes.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of August, 2015, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, as stated by Petitioner, is:
Whether the Commonwealth Court overstepped its appellate function in making credibility judgments which is the sole function of the Workers’ Compensation Judge?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
121 A.3d 981
IA CONSTRUCTION CORPORATION and Liberty Mutual Insurance Co. v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (RHODES). Petition of Jeffrey Rhodes.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 26, 2015.
